rules: Rule1: Either the company has authorization for the drug or the company has authorization for the device.
Rule2: Provided that the device passed the quality check, either the drug passed the quality check or the facility is manufacturing authorized.
Rule3: Whenever the device is calibrated, the device requires recalibration.
Rule4: Under the condition that the device is faulty, the device passed the quality check.
Rule5: Maintenance is scheduled for the device, or the device is calibrated, or the device is faulty.
Rule6: If the system has a safety violation, then it is not the case that the system is operational.
Rule7: Provided that the system requires inspection, the system has a safety violation.
Rule8: Whenever the drug batch is released, the material is rejected.
Rule9: If the company has authorization for the device, then the facility is manufacturing authorized.
Rule10: Under the condition that the drug batch is quarantined, the material requires testing.
Rule11: If the drug is shipped, then the drug is authorized for distribution.
Rule12: Either the drug is shipped or the drug is stored.
Rule13: Provided that the drug is stored, either the drug batch is released or the drug batch is quarantined.
Rule14: Under the condition that the material meets specifications, the material is approved for production.
Rule15: The documentation for the material is complete, or if the material requires documentation, then the material meets specifications.
Rule16: If the drug packaging is approved, then the material is sterile.
Rule17: Either the drug packaging is approved or the drug packaging is rejected.
Rule18: Provided that the material is approved, the material is compliant.
Rule19: The material is approved, or if the company has authorization for the drug, then the facility is manufacturing authorized.
Rule20: Whenever the material is rejected, it is not the case that the material is approved.
Rule21: If the material requires testing, then the material is not approved.
Rule22: The material is contaminated, or the material is rejected, or the material requires testing.
Rule23: Provided that the material is production ready, either the material is sterile or the material is not contaminated.
Rule24: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the material is approved then the material is not compliant, the material requires documentation.
Rule25: If it is not the case that if the drug packaging is rejected then the material is not contaminated, then the packaging has a labeling error.
Rule26: Whenever it is not the case that if the drug packaging is rejected then the material is not contaminated, it is not the case that the packaging has a labeling error.
Rule27: Provided that it is not the case that if the facility is not manufacturing authorized then the system is in emergency shutdown, the system is operational.
Rule28: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the facility is not manufacturing authorized then the system is in emergency shutdown, the system requires inspection.
facts: Fact1: The material is production ready.
Fact2: It is not the case that the device requires recalibration.
Fact3: Maintenance is not scheduled for the device.
Fact4: The system is not in emergency shutdown.
Fact5: The drug is not authorized for distribution.
Fact6: The material is not approved for production.
Fact7: The documentation for the material is not complete.
Fact8: The material is not sterile.
Fact9: The drug did not pass the quality check.
